feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.41
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Fixes for mongosh to allow snap packages to update to the edge/candidate version. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to lorodoes.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.42
entry.content:
This release fixes the following CRITICAL SECURITY ISSUES:

  • Fixed CRITICAL SECURITY ISSUE by updating meteor-node-stubs. Thanks to Meteor developers.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3. Thanks to dependabot and developers of dependencies.
  • Small tweaks to moderndark theme. Thanks to jghaanstra.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fixed link at readme. Thanks to dyercode.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.43
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated release script for Windows On-Premise, that is without container like Docker and Snap. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated translations Transifex URL at readme. Thanks to xet7.
  • Improve Docker files. Thanks to C0rn3j.
  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to developers of dependencies.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix DEBUG environment variable check. Thanks to verdel.
  • By default, use localized long date-time format. Thanks to tvogel.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.44
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Collapse Lists. Thanks to xet7.
  • Collapse Swimlanes. In Progress, does not work yet, not visible yet. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix board not visible at Collapse Lists. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.45
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Update Docker base container to Ubuntu 24.04, and update software versions. Thanks to developers of dependencies.
  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to developers of dependencies.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix display of tables with a large number of rows. Thanks to novashdima.
  • Fix white List color and define Silver in CSS instead of leaving it unset. Thanks to C0rn3j.
  • Allow silver color to be set in List and Swimlane. Thanks to C0rn3j.
  • Fix Can't set a Due Date that has a leading zero in time, errors with invalid time. Thanks to C0rn3j and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
